title: Heading
label: A1

variants:
  - file: title.html
    title: Title
    label: A1-1
    context:
      heading:
        type: title
        text: The title heading
  - file: subtitle.html
    title: Subtitle
    label: A1-2
    context:
      heading:
        type: subtitle
        text: This is a subtitle heading
---
